course_description: The course covers the microeconomic foundations of macroeconomics, the theoretical and empirical analysis of general equilibrium, and optimal monetary and fiscal policies.
prerequisites: (ECON 201 or ECON_OX 201) and (ECON 212 or ECON_OX  212) or equivalent transfer credit as a prerequisite.
